attributes.action: Make motor manufacurers install speedometers in new cars which can show both metric and imprerial distances and which show MPH as secondary speed indication
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK is the only country in Europe not using metric distances and speeds on its roads, however many UK based drivers drive in metric countries and in the future the we will need to convert our roads (as happened in Ireland in 2005). Current speedos are useless in a metric environment and provision for this should be made now to reduce problems when conversion does take place.
